title: How much Rioters are there in OCE?
body: Just wondering how much rioters are there? I only know Toxichawk

replies.body: Some of them only come out at night...
I'm assuming they don't sparkle since they're so awesome.

Here goes nothing:

Riot Sephyre
Riot Marauder
Riot ToxicHawk
Tomblade
Jimz
MasterMirkinen - Top Dawg (Can indeed knock you out with the fist in his beard)
Riot Gehrim
astralfoxy
Riot Benji
Riot Cochese

I swear I know more but these are the ones i play with, minus Riot Sephyre bcz you know, No bro love :(

Good engrish.

Click Red tracker and you can count the names, i think there are at least 6-7 that i know of, but probably a lot more behind the scenes (/ones that are mostly league support members)
I can remember 9, but I know there are some I can't remember the names of.
I only know of Sephyre /\/\/\, Toxichawk and Marauder, moistly because i see them on the boards
